### <a name="does-the-location-of-your-customer-data-have-a-direct-impact-on-your-end-users-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="babd6-123">客户数据的位置是否对最终用户的体验有直接影响？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-123">Does the location of your customer data have a direct impact on your end users' experience?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="babd6-124">Microsoft 365 的性能与用户离数据中心位置的距离并无简单的比例关系。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-124">The performance of Microsoft 365 is not simply proportional to a user's distance to data center locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-125">Microsoft 在其全球云网络、全球云基础结构和 Microsoft 365 服务体系结构方面持续投资，旨在为用户提供卓越且一致的体验，而不受客户数据的静态存储位置的影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-125">Microsoft's continued investments in its global cloud network, global cloud infrastructure, and the Microsoft 365 services architecture help provide users with a singular, consistent experience independent of where customer data is stored at rest.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-126">如果你的用户遇到性能问题，则应进一步对这些问题进行故障排除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-126">If your users are experiencing performance issues, you should troubleshoot those in depth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-127">Microsoft 已在 [Office 支持网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=862645)上发布面向 Microsoft 365 客户的指南，旨在规划和优化为最终用户提供的性能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-127">Microsoft has published guidance for Microsoft 365 customers to plan for and optimize end-user performance on the [Office Support web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=862645).</span></span>

### <a name="how-does-microsoft-help-me-comply-with-my-national-regional-and-industry-specific-regulations"></a><span data-ttu-id="babd6-128">Microsoft 如何帮助我遵守国家、地区和行业特定的法规？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-128">How does Microsoft help me comply with my national, regional, and industry-specific regulations?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="babd6-129">为帮助你遵守关于管理个人数据的收集和使用的国家、地区和行业特定的要求，Microsoft 365 提供了全球云生产力提供商中最全面的一套合规性产品/服务。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-129">To help you comply with national, regional, and industry-specific requirements governing the collection and use of individuals' data, Microsoft 365 offers the most comprehensive set of compliance offerings of any global cloud productivity provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-130">请在 Microsoft 信任中心的“[Microsoft 365 合规性](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=862317)”部分中查看[我们的合规性产品/服务](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864391)和更多详细信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-130">Please review [our compliance offerings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864391) and more details in the [Microsoft 365 Compliance](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=862317) section on the Microsoft Trust Center.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-131">此外，某些 Microsoft 365 计划还提供了其他合规性解决方案，以帮助你管理数据、遵守法律和法规要求并监视对数据执行的操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-131">Also, certain Microsoft 365 plans offer further compliance solutions to help you manage your data, comply with legal and regulatory requirements, and monitor actions taken on your data.</span></span>

### <a name="who-can-access-your-data-and-according-to-what-rules"></a><span data-ttu-id="babd6-132">谁可以按照什么规定访问你的数据？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-132">Who can access your data and according to what rules?</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="babd6-133">Microsoft 实施了强大的措施来帮助保护客户数据免受未经授权人员的不正当访问或使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-133">Microsoft implements strong measures to help protect your customer data from inappropriate access or use by unauthorized persons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-134">这包括限制 Microsoft 人员和分包商的访问权限，并详细规定了关于响应政府对客户数据的请求的要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-134">This includes restricting access by Microsoft personnel and subcontractors, and carefully defining requirements for responding to government requests for customer data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-135">但是，你可以随时出于任何原因访问自己的客户数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-135">However, you can access your own customer data at any time and for any reason.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-136">有关详细信息，请访问 [Microsoft 信任中心](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864392)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-136">More details are available on the [Microsoft Trust Center](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864392).</span></span>

### <a name="does-microsoft-access-your-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="babd6-137">Microsoft 是否会访问你的数据？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-137">Does Microsoft access your data?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="babd6-138">Microsoft 会自动执行大多数 Microsoft 365 操作，同时有意限制其自身对客户数据的访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-138">Microsoft automates most Microsoft 365 operations while intentionally limiting its own access to customer data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-139">这有助于我们大规模管理 Microsoft 365，并解决对客户数据造成内部威胁的风险。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-139">This helps us manage Microsoft 365 at scale and address the risks of internal threats to customer data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-140">默认情况下，Microsoft 工程师对 Microsoft 365 中的客户数据没有长期管理特权和长期访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-140">By default, Microsoft engineers have no standing administrative privileges and no standing access to customer data in Microsoft 365.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-141">Microsoft 工程师可能会在有限的时间内对客户数据进行有限的访问和记录，但仅在正常服务操作所需且仅在 Microsoft 的高级管理层成员批准（并且对于获得客户密码箱功能许可证的客户，还需该客户的批准）的情况下才会这样做。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-141">A Microsoft engineer may have limited and logged access to customer data for a limited amount of time, but only when necessary for normal service operations and only when approved by a member of senior management at Microsoft (and, for customers who are licensed for the Customer Lockbox feature, by the customer).</span></span>

### <a name="how-does-microsoft-secure-your-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="babd6-142">Microsoft 如何保护你的数据？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-142">How does Microsoft secure your data?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="babd6-143">Microsoft 在 Microsoft 365 中内置了可靠的策略、控件和系统，用于保护信息安全。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-143">Microsoft has robust policies, controls, and systems built into Microsoft 365 to help keep your information safe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-144">有关详细信息，请参阅 Microsoft 信任中心上的“[Microsoft 365 安全部分](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864393)”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-144">Review the [Microsoft 365 security section](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864393) on the Microsoft Trust Center to learn more.</span></span>

### <a name="does-microsoft-365-encrypt-your-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="babd6-145">Microsoft 365 是否对数据进行加密？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-145">Does Microsoft 365 encrypt your data?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="babd6-146">Microsoft 365 使用服务端技术对静态和传输中的客户数据进行加密。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-146">Microsoft 365 uses service-side technologies that encrypt customer data at rest and in transit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-147">对于静态客户数据，Microsoft 365 使用卷级和文件级加密。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-147">For customer data at rest, Microsoft 365 uses volume-level and file-level encryption.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-148">对于传输中的客户数据，Microsoft 365 使用多种加密技术在数据中心之间以及客户端和服务器之间进行通信，例如传输层安全性 (TLS) 和 Internet 协议安全性 (IPsec)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-148">For customer data in transit, Microsoft 365 uses multiple encryption technologies for communications between data centers and between clients and servers, such as Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Internet Protocol Security (IPsec).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-149">Microsoft 365 还包含客户管理的加密功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-149">Microsoft 365 also includes customer-managed encryption features.</span></span>

### <a name="what-are-multi-geo-capabilities-in-microsoft-365"></a><span data-ttu-id="babd6-152">Microsoft 365 中的多地理位置功能是什么？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-152">What are Multi-Geo Capabilities in Microsoft 365?</span></span>

### <a name="what-are-the-exceptions-for-intune-data-locations"></a><span data-ttu-id="babd6-157">Microsoft Intune 数据位置有哪些例外情况？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-157">What are the exceptions for Intune data locations?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="babd6-158">Microsoft 不会存储指定地理位置之外的静态 Intune 客户数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-158">Microsoft will not store Intune customer data at rest outside the stated Geo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-159">下列情况除外：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-159">except if:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="babd6-160">Microsoft 必须提供客户支持、解决服务问题或遵守法律要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-160">It is necessary for Microsoft to provide customer support, troubleshoot the service, or comply with legal requirements.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="babd6-161">客户配置帐户以启用此类客户数据存储，包括通过以下方式使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-161">The customer configures an account to enable such storage of customer data, including through the use of the following:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="babd6-162">设计为全局运行的功能，例如内容交付网络（CDN），可提供全局缓存服务，并将客户数据存储到世界各地的边缘位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-162">Features that are designed to operate globally, such as Content Delivery Network (CDN), which provides a global caching service and stores customer data at edge locations around the world.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="babd6-163">Azure Active Directory（Azure AD），它可能会在世界各地存储目录数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-163">Azure Active Directory (Azure AD), which may store directory data globally.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="babd6-164">这不适用于部署在美国的 Azure AD（仅适用于美国的 Azure AD 数据）或欧洲（Azure AD 数据存储在欧洲或美国）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-164">This does not apply to Azure AD deployments in the United States (where Azure AD data is stored solely in the United States) or in Europe (where Azure AD data is stored in Europe or the United States).</span></span>
   
  - <span data-ttu-id="babd6-165">“预览”、“Beta”或其他预发布服务通常将客户数据存储在美国，但也可能将其存储在世界各地。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-165">Preview, beta, or other prerelease services, which typically store customer data in the United States but may store it globally.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="babd6-166">无论如何，Microsoft 不会控制或限制客户或其最终用户可访问客户数据的地理位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="babd6-166">Regardless, Microsoft does not control or limit the Geo from which customers or their end users may access customer data.</span></span>
